snippet.title: 2nd Teaser Trailer for Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
snippet.description:
A VR Multiplayer Escape Room, and we are currently beta testing the game. If you would like to be one of the testers you can join our discord server and let us know in there.  We will also soon be releasing the final trailer, so don't forget to subscribe to get notified when we upload it.

Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3393820 
Check it out on Meta Quest store: https://vr.meta.me/s/1TIe1Od0bcQYYFR

Discord --- https://discord.gg/JwWgH98cE3 

#indiedev  #indiegame  #escaperoom  #vrgames  #escaperooms  #indiedeveloper  #gamedeveloper  #indiegames  #gamedevelopers #indiegamestudio #indiegamedev #teasertrailer #gameteaser #teaser
